title: How To Download Music on Your Android Phone

steps.title: Open the YouTube Music app.
steps.content: Open the YouTube Music app. YouTube Music comes pre-installed on all Android phones. Its logo is a white "play" icon inside a red circle. Only YouTube Music Premium subscribers may download music for offline use. Downloaded content must be played through the YouTube Music app. Unlike other music streaming apps, YouTube Music Premium allows you to download YouTube videos for offline viewing as well.

steps.title: Tap the Menu icon next to any song, album, video, podcast, or playlist ⋮.
steps.content: Tap the Menu icon next to any song, album, video, podcast, or playlist ⋮ . It’s the icon with three dots in the upper-right corner. The total amount of permitted storage space differs across different Android devices. However, all Premium subscribers are entitled to download songs, albums, and playlists. You must be online in order to download music.

steps.title: Tap the "Download" button.
steps.content: Tap the "Download" button. It is next to an icon that resembles a downward-facing arrow over a line. [1] X Research source Try to only download music when connected to a Wi-Fi network. Downloading over cellular data can use up all of your data rather quickly.

steps.title: Access your downloads.
steps.content: Access your downloads. To access your downloads, tap your profile icon in the upper-right corner of the screen, and then tap Downloads. You may remove a download at any time by tapping the menu icon with three dots ( ⋮ ) next to a downloaded item. Tap Remove Download and then tap Remove to confirm. To clear all your downloads, navigate to your downloads and tap the Gear/Settings icon at the top. Then tap Clear Downloads at the bottom. Then tap Remove to confirm.

steps.title: Enable smart downloads.
steps.content: Enable smart downloads. Users may also enable smart downloads, permitting YouTube Music to download music for you based on your listening habits. This feature ensures that you will always have music available, but it can take up your device's storage rather quickly. [2] X Research source To enable smart downloads, navigate to your downloads. Then, tap the Settings/Gear icon at the top. Then tap the toggle switch next to Smart Downloads . You must connect to the internet at least once every 30 days to keep your downloaded music.

steps.title: Open the Spotify app.
steps.content: Open the Spotify app. It is represented by Spotify's official logo, a green circle with three black curved lines. The free version of Spotify only allows you to download podcasts. You need a premium subscription to download music from Spotify .

steps.title: Find an album, playlist, or podcast you want to download.
steps.content: Find an album, playlist, or podcast you want to download. Spotify does not allow you to download individual songs, but you can add individual songs to a playlist and download them all. To download an individual song, create a playlist of just one song! Spotify allows you to download up to 10,000 songs across 5 different devices. You may also download any podcast on the app. Even Spotify Free users can download podcasts!

steps.title: Tap the download icon on the album, podcast, or playlist page.
steps.content: Tap the download icon on the album, podcast, or playlist page. It is located atop the page, next to the thumbnail of the cover. It is represented by an encircled downward-facing arrow. When your download is complete, the circle will turn green and include a checkmark instead. If you don’t see the download icon, tap the icon with three dots and then tap Download . Try to only download music when connected to a Wi-Fi network. Downloading over cellular data can use up all of your data rather quickly. Spotify will prevent you from downloading over cellular data unless you permit the app to do so. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Open the Apple Music app.
steps.content: Open the Apple Music app. Android owners can still take advantage of Apple Music and its robust library. The app is represented by a white musical note against a red background.

steps.title: Add music to your library.
steps.content: Add music to your library. Choose a song or album to add to your library. You can only download an album that has been added to your library or a song that is part of a playlist. [4] X Research source To add a song to your library, tap the icon with three dots ( ⋯ ) in the upper-right corner. Then tap Add to Library .

steps.title: Tap the download button atop your screen.
steps.content: Tap the download button atop your screen. On the page for an album or playlist, you will see a download icon atop the screen. It is an encircled downward-facing arrow. Tap on it to download the album or playlist for offline listening. To download an individual song, press and hold the song. Then, tap the download icon. You can also adjust your settings so that Apple Music automatically downloads everything you add to your library. Try to only download music when connected to a Wi-Fi network. Downloading over cellular data can use up all of your data rather quickly.

steps.title: Open the Amazon Music app.
steps.content: Open the Amazon Music app. If you have an Amazon Music Unlimited or Amazon Music Standard subscription, you can download songs, albums, or playlists to listen to offline. If you have an Amazon Music Prime account, you can only download all-access playlists to listen to offline.

steps.title: Find the album, song, or playlist you want to download.
steps.content: Find the album, song, or playlist you want to download. If you have added it to your library, you can tap Library at the bottom of the screen to view your entire library. If you have not added the music to your library, tap Find at the bottom of the screen and enter the name of the song, artist, playlist, or keywords related to a playlist. Tap the album or playlist you want to download.

steps.title: Tap the icon with three dots ⋯.
steps.content: Tap the icon with three dots ⋯ . It’ll be next to a song title or below an album or playlist title. This displays a drop-down menu.

steps.title: Tap Download.
steps.content: Tap Download . It’s near the top of the menu that appears when you tap the icon with three dots. This downloads your music. [5] X Research source If you have purchased music through Amazon Music, you can download the MP3s using the PC or Mac app and play them in any music player. [6] X Research source

steps.title: Open the Tidal app.
steps.content: Open the Tidal app. It is represented by a series of white diamonds against a black background. You must have a subscription to listen to or download music on Tidal.

steps.title: Find an album or playlist you wish to download.
steps.content: Find an album or playlist you wish to download. Tidal users cannot download individual songs, but they can download any album or any of their personal playlists. To search for an album or playlist, tap the magnifying glass icon at the bottom of the screen. Enter the name of an artist or playlist, or the keywords related to a playlist you would like to download. Tap an artist or playlist when you find it.

steps.title: Tap Download.
steps.content: Tap Download . It’s the icon that has an arrow pointing down inside of a circle. It’s at the top below the album or playlist title.

steps.title: Open Google Play
steps.content: Open Google Play . It's an orange triangle-shaped app with a white music note in the center. Google Play Music is no longer available as of December 2020. If you had a previous Google Play Music account but didn’t transfer your data to YouTube Music before February 2021, you can no longer access your old Google Play Music data. [7] X Research source

steps.title: Tap ☰.
steps.content: Tap ☰ . It's in the top-left corner of the screen.

steps.title: Tap Music Library.
steps.content: Tap Music Library . This takes you to the main page of your Music Library.

steps.title: Go to the album or song you want to download.
steps.content: Go to the album or song you want to download. Tap "Artists", "Albums", or "Songs" to browse for the song or album you want to download.

steps.title: Tap .
steps.content: Tap . Tap the "download" icon that resembles a downward arrow. If you don't see the download icon, you can also tap ⋮ next to the song or album and then tap Download from the drop-down list. If the download option is not available, you may need to purchase the music or subscribe to Google Play Music.
